I enjoy the app and all the nice features for customizing notes. My main complaint is that the window from which notes selected for re-opening and editing cannot be minimized. I find this really annoying because that windows takes up a lot of space, and closing it immediately closes all the notes. I'd very much like it if that window could be minimized.
summary: Great app, but some annoying features

I am running latest Ubuntu LTS. This software works great. But this software has few problems. First, its not that much user friendly as of window. The program should have be very light weight. And the next is of course high cpu usage. It uses 100% of one of thread time. I have never expected any such unusual behavior. Hence it makes my battery drain faster and makes my laptop hotter. The cpu usage still high when the app is on idol. I need this app and need to be running for long time. Because of his I am extremely disappointed.

The old version of this app. was great; it did what it was supposed to do: allow the user to take notes, save them and customise the font size a bit. But now? The UI is fancier but I was so frustrated from the word suggestions that I uninstalled out of frustration.
summary: Word suggestions while typing are beyond annoying

description: Unintuitive and uncomfortable UI. Don't understand the need for a mandatory central "pin board" where all notes are displayed. Text suggestions are highly distracting and annoying. Options to adjust settings are either non-existent (see: text suggestions) or unintuitive (e.g. which button to press to change colours).
summary: Not worth using this over a regular notes application

Подтверждаю пост ниже: при закрытии основного окна программы, закрываются и сами стикеры. При сворачивании программы, на стикерах пропадают кнопки. Не понимаю, зачем такой сырой продукт вкладывать?
